title: Was Donald Trump's mother an undocumented immigrant?
subtitle: Although their nationality status appears to have been incorrectly documented in the 1940 census in the United States, there is no evidence to suggest that Donald Trump ' s mother violated any immigration laws before acquiring citizenship in 1942.
author: Alex Kasprak
vclaim: Mary Ann McLeod, the mother of President Donald Trump, emigrated illegally to the United States in 1929.
